text: Anata gataga moshi sonshō o kabutte mo, aitegata mo mata dōyō no dageki o ukete iru. Ware wa ningen no ma ni (shuju no unmei no) kon'na hi o kōgo ni sazukeru. Arrā wa kore ni yotte (hontō no) shinja o shiri, anata gata no naka kara (shinri no tame no junkyō no) jisshō-sha o age rareru. Arrā wa fugi no to o aisa renai
